casebody.data:
Waymare BILLUPS
v.
Theodis BECK; Boyd Bennett; Ernest Sutton; Walter G. Edwards, Jr. No. 603P03-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2004. Waymare Billups, Pro Se. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, Joel H. Brewer, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 3rd day of June 2004 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Person County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 24th day of June 2004."
